roleset.name: remove a methyl group from a chemical compound

example.name: demethylate-v: active use, with product of the reaction
example.text: It demethylates veratric acid to a mixture of vanillic and isovanillic acids.
example.arg: to a mixture of vanillic and isovanillic acids.

example.name: demethylate-v: example with agent and instrument
example.text: To test our second hypothesis, we demethylated melanoma cells lines with 5-aza-2�-deoxycytidine and measured the miRNA-137 expression by qRT-PCR.

example.name: demethylation-n
example.text: Active and Passive Demethylation of Male and Female Pronuclear DNA in the Mammalian Zygote.
example.arg: of Male and Female Pronuclear DNA

roleset.note: DEMETHYLATE-V NOTES: Created for Bio-AMR annotations.
